definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: king allied with Chedorlaomer called [[מֶלֶח גּוֹיִם]] Ge 14:1, Ge 14:9; Qalga[l], LXXL Qargal (n.pr. Tudḫula occurs on 1ate Bab. tablet, Pinches:Trans. Vict. Inst., xxix (1897), 47, 73, Say:Acad. Mk 21, Mk 1896, 242; Hast. DB TIDAL; but ident. of pers. unproven, LW King:Hammurabi i (1898), liii Hpt:Ball Ge 14, 1 Che:Ency. Bib. TIDAL).
